channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- Open Build Service
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- Open Build Service

item.title: CVE-2017-9268|2024-08-05T17:02:43.626Z -- suse -- open%20build%20service
item.description: In the open build service before 201707022 the wipetrigger and rebuild actions checked the wrong project for permissions, allowing authenticated users to cause operations on projects where they did not have permissions leading to denial of service (resource consumption).
